sentences.english: Plough deep, while sluggards sleep; and you have corn to sell and to keep.

sentences.english: It is true that Egypt, once the breadbasket of the Roman empire, has been unable to feed itself.
sentences.chinese: 的确，一度是罗马帝国的粮仓的埃及却不能自给自足。

sentences.english: The Imperial Granary edition The Peony Pavilion offers a concept of returning to the original state of Kunqu Opera.
